title: Angelina and Men
description: ANGELINA AND MEN is an autobiographical novel that ressuscitates feminine powers buried in thousand years of dogmatic beliefs, repressions and submissions. Capturing a girl's evolution through relationships, music, reading and traveling, the adventure is a free-spirited ride rarely explored by men and women today. Taboos are broken. Breakthrough and ripening of the American dream happen. Curiosity, intuition, imagination and creativity lead to endless awakening and rewarding experiences.
author: Shaktima Brien
